mapper.select: select * from (select @RN:=@RN+1 as rnum, a.* from (select c.*,r.r_name,s.sf_name,ct.ct_name from course_t c,room_t r,staff_t s,course_type_t ct WHERE c_status = 0 and c.ct_idx= ct.ct_idx and c.r_idx=r.r_idx and s.sf_idx = c.sf_idx order by c_idx desc)a ,(select @RN:=0) b) c where c.rnum between ${begin} and ${end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course_t(c_name,start_date,end_date,course_fee,c_peo_num, c_round_num, c_status, ct_idx, sf_idx,r_idx ,c_day) values(#{c_name}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{course_fee}, #{c_peo_num}, #{c_round_num}, 0, #{ct_idx}, #{sf_idx}, 3 ,#{c_day})
mapper.select: select count(*) from course_t where c_status = 0

select * from (select @RN:=@RN+1 as rnum, a.* from (select c.*,r.r_name,s.sf_name,ct.ct_name from course_t c,room_t r,staff_t s,course_type_t ct
c.c_status = 0 and c.ct_idx= ct.ct_idx and c.r_idx=r.r_idx and s.sf_idx = c.sf_idx and (c.start_date like concat (#{year},'%') or c.end_date like concat (#{year},'%'))
order by ct_idx asc )a ,(select @RN:=0) b) c
